mapper.select: select id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, gmt_create, gmt_modified, login_time, status from dongbao.ums_member where id = #{id}
select id, username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, gmt_create, gmt_modified, login_time, status from dongbao.ums_member limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into dongbao.ums_member(username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, gmt_create, gmt_modified, login_time, status) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{icon}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{note}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{loginTime}, #{status})

insert into dongbao.ums_member(username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, gmt_create, gmt_modified, login_time, status) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.note}, #{entity.gmtCreate}, #{entity.gmtModified}, #{entity.loginTime}, #{entity.status})

insert into dongbao.ums_member(username, password, icon, email, nick_name, note, gmt_create, gmt_modified, login_time, status) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.nickName}, #{entity.note}, #{entity.gmtCreate}, #{entity.gmtModified}, #{entity.loginTime}, #{entity.status})
on duplicate key update username = values(username) , password = values(password) , icon = values(icon) , email = values(email) , nick_name = values(nick_name) , note = values(note) , gmt_create = values(gmt_create) , gmt_modified = values(gmt_modified) , login_time = values(login_time) , status = values(status)
mapper.update:
update dongbao.ums_member
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
icon = #{icon},
email = #{email},
nick_name = #{nickName},
note = #{note},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
login_time = #{loginTime},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id}
